devdoc.author: Babylon Finance Executes a buy operation

params._asset: Asset to receive into this operation
params._capital: Amount of asset received param _assetStatus        Status of the asset amount
params._data: OpData e.g. Address of the token to buy param _garden             Garden of the strategy param _integration        Address of the integration to execute

params._percentage: of capital to exit from the strategy

params._garden: Garden the strategy belongs to param _integration         Status of the asset amount

devdoc.title: BuyOperation

getNAV(bytes,address,address).notice: Gets the NAV of the buy op in the reserve asset

getName().notice: Returns the name of the operation

validateOperation(bytes,address,address,.notice: Sets operation data for the buy operation
